Exciting new features include:
- Club EMOJI keyboards
- Top player snapshots
- News and videos are now more prominent in menus
- Voiceover users can now recognise card titles
- Minor bug fixes

We've added some great improvements for iOS 11, including:
- Club news widget - add it to your device's "Today" view
- 3D menus
- Force press quick-link options (device must support this feature)
- iPhone X support
- VoiceOver now reads full words, not abbreviations, on the Player and Ladder pages

We have made some changes to the way you login to the Carlton app. Some users may be presented with the login screen and asked to create a Carlton account - or you can login with your Carlton membership account to access your digital membership card as well as other exclusive content from the club. This of course can be skipped if you choose not to.
